tool_description: Get info about Indian Zip Code
name: Daddy: ZIP CODE - INDIA
title: Daddy: ZIP CODE - INDIA

api_list.name: Random Zip
api_list.description:
Return information about Random Zip Code. 
- region 
- state
- latitude
- longitude
- post office
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://daddy-zip-code-india.p.rapidapi.com/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daddy-zip-code-india.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://daddy-zip-code-india.p.rapidapi.com/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daddy-zip-code-india.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
